text:
Does anyone know if its possible to extract the part of the HubSpot video field that enables video tracking/analytics from the dashboard?

We tend to use `<https://github.com/sampotts/plyr>` for video embeds because, its just so handy for full-customisation/control but, if you use anything other than the standard field, you lose tracking/analytics :white_frowning_face:

Does that field perhaps update a specific HubSpot cookie?

not sure if there is something on the ideas board for this — but I think there should be.

In our last version we didn’t really have a video api would could tap into without a huge work around. I’m sure if you wanted to create on on the ideas board it would be amazing and we could post this in a few areas
Thanks <@U25PYL3Q8>, I'll have a review of the ideas board and then submit one of there isn't anything similar :slightly_smiling_face:
let me know how that pans out and i’d be happy to comment on it and share it amongst people
